ModMetaData.name: Traders Sell Biotech Items
ModMetaData.author: Flixbox
ModMetaData.description:
This mod dynamically adds Genepacks, Archite Capsules and Deathrest Capacity Serums to traders that already carry certain medical or high-tech items like Advanced Components or Neutroamine.
This also includes any modded traders.
GitHub: https://github.com/Flixbox/TradersSellBiotechItems
